name: Zombies & Love
description:
"Zombies & Love" is a story about love and striving to survive in the world of a real zombie apocalypse. In this game you will immerse yourself in a story filled with passions, horror adventures, sex scenes and unforgettable battles with crowds of zombies.

Learn the story of Ted and Vera and help them survive in the world of zombie apocalypse! But are you ready to dive into this cruel and bloody world filled with horrors and bloodthirsty zombies? Will you be able to resist the crowds of screaming zombies and get out of the city alive?

Executed in a realistic art style of a FPS zombie shooter game, “Zombies & Love” is a unique adult world wrapped in a deeply disturbing atmosphere. The adult storyline incorporates sexual themes and unexpected moments, weaving a compelling and complex narrative that will keep you in suspense, as well as numerous battles and hordes of zombies.

"Zombies & Love" - combines exciting gameplay, tense atmosphere, eroticism and elements of FPS zombie shooter. Exciting battles, various zombies and constant tension await you. Get ready for an unprecedented gaming experience that pushes the boundaries of explicit entertainment.
